TopicTitle: Test TD-12 Decoupler landed at Kerbin - no 'test' button on decoupler?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have a mission that says I should test the TD-12 Decoupler landed at Kerbin, by pressing the 'test' button. But the decoupler doesn't show a test button - see screenshot here. What am I doing wrong?

 

Akos

Hi DarkEye. Just activate the part through normal staging and you should get credit for testing it. 

Welcome to the forum, and your post has been moved to the Gameplay Questions sub.
